# Installation of sCCIgen

```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")

devtools::install_github("songxiaoyu/sCCIgen")
```

or

```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("remotes")

remotes::install_github("songxiaoyu/sCCIgen")
```

# Help

Encountering errors? Post to an issue to the Giotto GitHub page [here](https://github.com/songxiaoyu/sCCIgen). Please include the version numbers of R, sCCIgen, and the OS in use at the time of the issue.
